title: Oniichan dakedo Ai sae Areba Kankeinai yo ne! (OniAi)
synopsis: After their parents' deaths, brother and sister Akito and Akiko Himenokouji were forced to live with separate families for six years. But now they have finally reunited and begin to live together. It quickly becomes apparent that Akiko harbors romantic feelings for her brother; however, Akito only sees her as a sibling.
